column1:
Odeinoichus,"2013-05-28T17:19:13.333Z","A Miniature Seperatist Vehicle","

Set #30243 Umbaran MHC: This year's Star Wars polybag offerings have relied mostly on vehicles seen in the 2012 and 2013 collection of Mini-Figure scaled ships/vehicles. And most of them offer a great deal for your dollar.

The Umbaran MHC (Or Mobile Heavy Cannon) is a massive vehicle shrunk down to mini-model scale. The colors and the build of the model make this look somewhat similar to Seperatist Spider-Droids found in Mini-Figure scale sets, but it does represent the larger model faithfully and impressively.

The cool blues with the gray pieces have a uniform look to them that is just eye catchingly fun, the six legs are all quite mobile to accomplish several different poses, the cannon on the top is fairly simple looking but works well in this scale.

Overall I'd say this is one Polybag you should definitely try to track down, good for parts in useful colors and a fun looking model. Another great offering from LEGO's 2013 Polybags.
